lines.Line: Mornin’ Pheebs. (Sits down.) Well, my movie has officially beenNEWLINEcanceled

3.SceneDescription: Phoebe’s cab, Phoebe and Joey are driving back. Phoebe is driving whileNEWLINEJoey is sleeping.

lines.Line: Okay, you have 19 questions left. Use them wisely. (Joey groans.) ComeNEWLINEon Joey! You can’t win if you don’t ask any (sees that he’s asleep) QUESTIONS!!
